alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Geary (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dickinson and southern Geary Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Woodbine, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Junction City, Abilene, Grandview Plaza, Chapman, Enterprise, Woodbine and Moonlight. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 275 and 303. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central, northeastern and east central Kansas.
